akn:content.akn:p: (a) In this section, the term “recipient” means a State or local governmental authority, or any other operator of a public transportation system, that receives financial assistance under this chapter.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Public Transportation Safety Certification Training Program.—

akn:content.akn:p: (c) The Secretary shall establish a public transportation safety certification training program for Federal and State employees, or other designated personnel, who conduct safety audits and examinations of public transportation systems and employees of public transportation agencies directly responsible for safety oversight.
(f) In carrying out this section, the Secretary may—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Consultation by the Secretary of Homeland Security.—

akn:content.akn:p: (i) The Secretary of Homeland Security shall consult with the Secretary of Transportation before the Secretary of Homeland Security issues a rule or order that the Secretary of Transportation determines affects the safety of public transportation design, construction, or operations.
